def: Inflammation of external parts of the body; erysipelatousinflammation.
A monster, half maid and half serpent.
Having no petals, or flower leaves. [See Illust. under Anther].
The science or a treatise on the atmosphere.

The quality of being racy; peculiar and piquant flavor.The general characteristics of his [Cobbett's] style wereperspicuity, unequaled and inimitable; . . . a purity always simple,and raciness often elegant. London Times.

One who withdraws or separates himself; especially, one whowithdraws from a church to which he has belonged; a seceder from anestablished church; a dissenter; a nonconformist; a schismatic; asectary.Heavy fines on divines who should preach in any meeting of separatist. Macaulay.
A long, heavy, two-handed and two-edged sword, formerly used bySpanish foot soldiers and by executioners. Wilhelm.
Pertaining to, or derived from, dextrose; as, dextronic acid.Dextronic acid, a sirupy substance obtained by the partial oxidationof various carbohydrates, as dextrose, etc.
A drinking cup. [Written also romkin.] [Obs.] Halliwell.
